footer.adminContact: You can find server app for this client application on my github page (parkandrest-kotlin)

forms.loginHelper: Contact administrator if you don't have an account
forms.reportDate: Show financial report for the date

validation.tariffType: Illegal tariff type, expected value is REGULAR or VIP

header.goodbye: Have a nice day! Signing Out..

info.accountMonitor: Your result will appear here, after submitting the date
info.about: Parkandrest is angular 7 based demo application made for educational purposes. Current version could be used with server application (https://github.com/pokemzok/parkandrest-kotlin) or fully client-side. You can find more about the project on it's README page: https://github.com/pokemzok/parkandrest-ui

notifications.SERVER_OFFLINE: Server is Offline Choosing Mock Authentication Service
notifications.unauthorized: User does not have required authority to view this page. Routing back to main page.
notifications.authStoreFailure: There was a problem with credentials. Please contact your administrator.

serverStatuses.0: Server is not responding. Please contact your administrator.
serverStatuses.404: Server is not responding for your request. Please contact your administrator. Status 404.
serverStatuses.401: Unauthorized request. Make sure you have required authorization.
serverStatuses.400: Bad request. Please contact your administrator. Status 400.
serverStatuses.403: Permission denied. Contact your administrator in order to get necessary permissions.
serverStatuses.500: Internal server error occurred. Please contact your administrator. Status 500.

serverCodes.NO_TARIFF_PRESENT: Parking does not have a tariff. Calculations cancelled.
serverCodes.NO_SUCH_TARIFF: No such tariff. Select different one.
serverCodes.DIFFERENT_PARKING_ON_TARIFFS: Tariff cannot be update. There is a different parking id.
serverCodes.DIFFERENT_TARIFFS_TYPES: Tariff cannot be update, tariff type is different from previous
serverCodes.UNEXPECTED_EXCEPTION: Unexpected exception occurred. Please contact your administrator for details.

welcomeMessage: Welcome to the 'Park And Rest' application

header.estimation: Estimated charge for periods of quantity {{period}}
header.startParkingmeter: You have started the parking meter
header.stopParkingmeter: You have stopped the parking meter
